ingredients.content: 1 orange, thin peelings of skin only
15 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra to grease
900 g pork mince, broken in pieces

preparations.content: Place orange peel, bread, nutmeg, cloves, salt, pepper and parsley in mixing bowl then chop <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions, garlic, bacon and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pine nuts and cook <b>6 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add pork, cream, reserved spiced breadcrumbs and eggs then, with aid of spatula, mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Shape mixture into 18-20 balls (approx. 5 cm). Grease Varoma tray and dish then arrange stuffing balls so they are evenly spaced.
Place water in mixing bowl, place Varoma into position, cover with Varoma lid and steam <b>20-25 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>. Serve stuffing balls as an appetiser or side dish.
